attributes.action: Stop allowing financial institutions to charge expired debit/credit cards
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If you have a subscription that you pay for using either a credit or debit card the supplier can still debit your account even if the card has expired. Stop allowing financial institutions to break their own rules, by aiding and abetting the fraudulent use of your debit or credit card by unscrupulous suppliers.
